com.amazonaws.services.iot.client

Class AWSIotException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • com.amazonaws.services.iot.client.AWSIotException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class AWSIotException
extends Exception
    This is a generic exception that can be thrown in most of the APIs, blocking and non-blocking, by the library.
    See Also:
